# Damage Groups and Types This section will cover the different damage groups and types, giving a brief description of them, how to diagnose them without a health analyzer, and their most common cures.
Damage in SS14 is broken down into [color=Gold]Groups[/color] and [color=DeepSkyBlue]Types[/color]. The damage groups and their types are summarized below:
[color=Gold]Brute[/color]: - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Blunt[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Slash[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Piercing[/color]
[color=Gold]Burn[/color]: - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Heat[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Shock[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Cold[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Caustic[/color]
[color=Gold]Toxin[/color]: - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Poison[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Radiation[/color]
[color=Gold]Airloss[/color]: - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Asphyxiation[/color] - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Bloodloss[/color]
[color=Gold]Genetic[/color]: - [color=DeepSkyBlue]Cellular[/color]
